text: Hyrule Warriors is a video game for the Wii U console. It is a crossover between The Legend of Zelda and Dynasty Warriors series. It was developed by Tecmo Koei and Nintendo. It is a spin-off game in The Legend of Zelda series.'Hyrule Warriors' 3D action game announced for Wii U [Update: Trailer added] | Joystiq It was released on August 14, 2014. ==Gameplay== The game plays like the Dynasty Warriors series, using the setting and characters from The Legend of Zelda.Zelda spin-off Hyrule Warriors announced • News • Wii U • Eurogamer.net The player controls Link to take on a large number of enemies from The Legend of Zelda series and you can unlock other characters who you can also play as.Tecmo-Koei and Nintendo team up for Zelda: Hyrule Warriors combat game | GamesBeat | Games | by Jeff Grubb The player can use weapons such as a sword and bombs, as well as Link's spin attack.Zelda and Dynasty Warriors come together for "Hyrule Warriors" on Wii U in 2014 - GameSpot Like in other The Legend of Zelda games, the player can get new items by finding and opening chests.Zelda: Hyrule Warriors announced for Wii U with trailer - watch - Gaming News - Digital Spy ==References== Category:2014 video games Category:The Legend of Zelda spin-off games Category:Action video games Category:Crossover video games Category:Crowd-combat fighting games Category:Hack and slash games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Nintendo 3DS games Category:Nintendo Network games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Team Ninja games Category:Video games about time travel Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Wii U games
title: Hyrule Warriors
